name: death's ghost
description:
its a game inspired by the style of "death is progress" in one of jonas tyroller's WOOWIIE game jams. it was originally started as a game jam game against a friend of mine but that's what it is now might make more levels and such and might never. probably never i guess

in the latest update (1.3) press the ESC button to exit

here is an explained in less than your attention span video for it :

it's essentially the trailer

oh yeah and zayko helped and i guess hulx too and stuff
